synopsis.text: Benio, Nadeshiko, and Kobeni's cherished childhood memories come to life as Kobeni fondly reminisces about their shared past. In a heartwarming exchange, Mashiro regales Kobeni with tales of her own, recounting a nostalgic day spent with Hakuya amidst the tranquil beauty of her mountainous hometown. This special OVA, bundled with the fifth volume of the Mikakunin de Shinkoukei manga, invites viewers to delve into the rich emotional tapestry woven by these unforgettable characters.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
